const {

} = require('gatsby/graphql')


const HeadingLevels = new GraphQLEnumType({
  // ä»–ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚‚å«ã‚ã¦ä¸€æ„ãªåå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã‚‹

  name: `LinkHeadingLevels`,

    h4: { value: 4 },
    h5: { value: 5 },

// è¦ªãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼æƒ…å ±
const ParentHeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({
  name: `MarkdownParentLinkHeadings`,
  fields: {
    value: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve: ({value}) => value,
    },
    id: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve: ({id}) => id,
    },
    depth: {
      type: GraphQLInt,
      resolve: ({depth}) => depth,
    },
  }
})

const HeadingType = new GraphQLObjectType({
  name: `MarkdownLinkHeading`,
  fields: {
    value: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.value
      },
    },
    id: {
      type: GraphQLString,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.id
      },
    },
    depth: {
      type: GraphQLInt,
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.depth
      },
    },
    parents: {
      type: new GraphQLList(ParentHeadingType),
      resolve(heading) {
        return heading.parents
      },
    },
  },
})

import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}

import remark from 'remark'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import mdastToString from 'mdast-util-to-string';
import GithubSlugger from 'github-slugger';
const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()

// ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡æƒ…å ±ã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹
function _extractToc(rawMarkdownBody) {
  githubSlugger.reset();

  const result = []
  const ast = remark().parse(rawMarkdownBody);  visit(ast, 'heading', child => {    const value = child.children[0].value    const id = githubSlugger.slug(value || mdastToString(child))    const depth = child.depth    result.push({      value,      id,      depth    })  })
  return result
}

import React from 'react';
import { throttle } from 'lodash';
import Toc from './toc';

const githubSlugger = new GithubSlugger()


class ScrollSyncToc extends React.Component {
  constructor(props, context) {
    super(props, context);

    this.toc = _getToc(this.props.rawMarkdownBody)

    this.state = {
      activeItemIds: [],
      itemTopOffsets: [],
    };

    this.calculateItemTopOffsets = this.calculateItemTopOffsets.bind(this);
    this.handleScroll = throttle(this.handleScroll.bind(this), 100) // è² è·è»½æ¸›ã®ãŸã‚é–“å¼•ã  }

  componentDidMount() {    this.calculateItemTopOffsets();    window.addEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);  }
  componentWillUnmount() {    window.removeEventListener(`scroll`, this.handleScroll);  }
  calculateItemTopOffsets() {
    this.setState({
      itemTopOffsets: _getElementTopOffsetsById(this.toc),
    });
  }

  handleScroll() {    const { itemTopOffsets } = this.state;    const item = itemTopOffsets.find((current, i) => {      const next = itemTopOffsets[i + 1]      // è‡ªç« ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹      // ã‹ã¤ æ¬¡ç« ã¾ã§ã¯ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ å ´åˆã¯      // è‡ªç« ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã¿ãªã™      return next        ? window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop &&            window.scrollY < next.offsetTop        : window.scrollY >= current.offsetTop;    })    // Qiitaã£ã½ãè‡ªç« ã¨ã‚ã‚ã›ã¦è¦ªç« ã‚’ãƒã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã•ã›ãŸã„ã®ã§    // itemTopOffsetsã§ã¯è¦ªç« ã®å‚ç…§ã‚‚æŒãŸã›ã¦ãŠã    // ã“ã“ã§activeItemIdsã«æ ¼ç´ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚    const activeItemIds =      item        ? item.parents          ? [item.id, ...item.parents.map(i => i.id)]          : [item.id]        : [];    // setStateã‚’ä»‹ã—ã¦stateã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§    // è¡¨ç¤ºä¸­ã®ç« ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã«ã®ã¿å†æç”»ãŒèµ°ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚    this.setState({activeItemIds});  }
  render() {
    const { activeItemIds } = this.state;
    return <Toc activeItemIds={activeItemIds} toc={this.toc} {...this.props} />;
  }
}

import React from 'react'
import { HashLink as Link } from 'react-router-hash-link';

class Toc extends React.Component {
  render() {
    const { toc, activeItemIds } = this.props;
    const items = toc.map(item => {
      return (
        <li style={{
          textAlign: 'left',
          marginLeft: `${(item.depth - 2) * 24}px`,
          listStyle: 'none'
          }}>
          <Link
            key={item.id}
            to={`#${item.id}`}
            className={activeItemIds.includes(item.id) ? 'active' : ''}>{item.value}</Link>        </li>
      )
    })

    return (
      <ul style={{padding: '12px', background: '#eee'}}>
        {items}
      </ul>
    );
  }
}

export default Toc;

QiitaAPIã§å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹HTMLã¯æ—¢ã«ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ãŒåŸ‹ã‚è¾¼ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã®ã§ã€HTMLã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡ã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ HTMLæ§‹æ–‡è§£æã«ã¯unifiedã®rehypeã‚’ä½¿ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

HTMLã‹ã‚‰ç›®æ¬¡æƒ…å ±æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹å‡¦ç†
import rehype from 'rehype'
import visit from 'unist-util-visit'
import hastToString from 'hast-util-to-string'

const MIN_HEADER_DEPTH = 1
const HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST = 'element'
const HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST = ['h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6']

function _extractHeadingDetails(htmlStr) {
  // HASTå½¢å¼ã®æŠ½è±¡æ§‹æ–‡æœ¨ã«å¤‰æ›
  const htmlAst = rehype.parse(htmlStr)

  // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°(h1ã€œh6ã‚¿ã‚°)ã‚’æ¢ã™
  const result = []
  visit(htmlAst, HEADER_TYPE_IN_HAST, node => {
    if (!HEADER_TAG_NAMES_IN_HAST.includes(node.tagName)) {
      return
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚°ã‹ã‚‰æ·±ã•ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    const heading = {
      depth: Number(node.tagName[1]),
      value: hastToString(node).replace('\n', '')
    }
    // aã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã†ã¡hrefå±æ€§ãŒ#å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ¢ã—idã‚’æŠ½å‡º
    node.children.filter(c => _isHeaderIdLink(c)).forEach(c => {
      heading.id = decodeURI(c.properties.href.split('#')[1])
    });

    result.push(heading)
  })

  return result
}

function _isHeaderIdLink(node) {
  return node.tagName === 'a'
          && node.properties.href
          && node.properties.href.startsWith('#')
}
